subject: Attn Dear Beneficiary, payment of your funds.
body:
East Boston Savings Bank  Branch Andrew Square Branc  501 South Hampton Street, South Boston, MA 02127 U.SA


    Attention Dear  customer

How are you doing today sir, I hope this email meets you in good health? My name is Mr. Richard J Gavegnano, I am the current executive managing director east Boston savings bank.

I am contacting you today in regards to your unpaid funds in total sum of ($16,000,000 .00) sixteen million million United States of America dollars.which some criminal wanted to claim. But they was caught by the federal bureau of investigation department FBI.

I wish to inform you that the world bank has mandated this bank and has entrusted the payment under our custody and I want to assure you that we are here to serve you better because our customers satisfaction is our concern and first priority.

On this noted, I want you to get back to this office and let us know which of these payments method is your choice 1) international  bank draft, 2) direct bank to bank transfer 3)cashier check 4 ) ATM card.

You are also required to use your current information such as, your full names, current address, gender, occupation, city/ county name and your direct phone numbers.

 I will appreciate it you can get back to me on or before 24 hours from now.

Yours faithfully
Richard J Gavegnano
Current Managing Director
East Boston Savings Bank

subject: Re: Attn Dear Beneficiary, payment of your funds.
body:
Hello Mr. Richard Gavegnano,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm doing fine, thank you for asking. It's quite surprising to hear about the unpaid funds, as I wasn't aware of such a situation.

It's reassuring to know that the World Bank has entrusted East Boston Savings Bank with this matter. As a customer, it's comforting to know that my interests are being prioritized.

Regarding the payment methods, could you please provide more details about each one? For instance, how long would each method take and are there any fees associated with them?

Also, I noticed that you asked for some personal information. However, I am not comfortable sharing these details over email due to security reasons. Is there another secure way we can handle this?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Tommie

subject: Re: Attn Dear Beneficiary, your payment.
body:
Hello Mr. Richard Gavegnano,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm doing quite alright, thank you for asking. It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance.

Your email certainly caught my attention! Sixteen million dollars is a lot of money and it's hard to believe that someone would try to claim it unlawfully. I'm glad the FBI was able to intervene.

It's reassuring to know that the World Bank has entrusted East Boston Savings Bank with this matter. As for the payment method, could you please provide more details about each option? I'd like to understand them better before making a decision.

Also, you mentioned needing some information from me. However, I must apologize as I am not comfortable sharing personal details over email due to security reasons. Is there another way we can verify my identity?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Tommie

subject: Re: Re: Attn Dear Beneficiary, payment of your funds.

Thank you sir and I am fine, thanks for your response. I hope you are and your family all slept well last night?

 Yes, I want you to know that any of the payment methods listed here will not exceed period of 5 working days and the only fee attached to each is the documents that will backup this transaction.

The issue of your personal details requested were very essential as it will be helpful to obtain the documents on your behalf and I also wish to assure you that your information will be protected confidential.

You are also required to use your current information such as, your full names, current address, gender, occupation, city/ county name and your direct phone numbers.

Richard J Gavegnano

subject: Re: Re: Attn Dear Beneficiary, your payment.
body:
East Boston Savings Bank  Branch Andrew Square Branc  501 South Hampton Street, South Boston, MA 02127 U.SA

 Attention Dear  customer

I'm glad to explain to you about this 4 payment pattern works in other to enable you select the one best for you.
1) international bank draft is what you can receive deposit in any bank and it be given to or transfer after it has cleared it usually take 3 to 4 days.

2) direct wire transfer is the payment that will transfer from here directly into your bank account and it will reflect after few working days.

3) cashier check, it will send to you and then you take it to your bank  deposit and it will also take 3 working days then you can cash it out from your local bank

4) ATM card, we will credit all your total funds into the card and once you receive it a pin code will be sent to you. That will enable you to withdraw money from any ATM machine anywhere in the world

Remember to send  your current information such as, your full names, current address, gender, occupation, city/ county name and your direct phone numbers.

Yours faithfully
Richard J Gavegnano
Current Managing Director
East Boston Savings Bank

subject: Re: Re: Re: Attn Dear Beneficiary, payment of your funds.

I understand your point but I assured you that your details are your privacy and cannot be tempered with and there is no other means due to our time.

I want you to understand that we are dealing with public and we are very cautious of their privacy and security we can't be careless and this is our duty and we have existed for years now.

I understand what you are saying perfectly okay. We can't proceed with this information to avoid any mistakes okay. I am assuring you once again that your information will be kept private and very confidential as we have done to our numerous customers.


Yours faithfully
Richard J Gavegnano
Current Managing Director
East Boston Savings Bank

Attention Dear customer

Your message has been noted, and I have already explained to you why your details are needed and it's very important because we will make sure that the information are updated on the documents without any mistakes.

Yes, mandated and necessary to all customers there's no exceptions.

Finally, I wish to let you know that once you comply to my instructions, we will start the process by Monday so that by Thursday next week you will be able to have access to your funds. I will not be able to respond to your email again till we resume office by Monday next week thanks.


Yours faithfully
Richard J Gavegnano
Current Managing Director
East Boston Savings Bank
